title: Absolutely awesome! No question.

embed.description: We created Dark Star Cho'Gath with Bryan, a League player who visited Riot in 2017 through our partnership with The Make-A-Wish Foundation. Bryan's wish was "to meet the creators of Riot Games and create a skin with them!" We're honored to be bringing that skin into League and supporting nonprofit organizations along the way.

body:
Just fantastic. An absolutely great story!
Nice work to everyone involved at Riot and Make a Wish!

This is truly my idea of a community focused game/company.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
